channel.title: Undergraduate on Columbia DSI Scholars
channel.description: Recent content in Undergraduate on Columbia DSI Scholars

item.title: CTV / L2M Summer Undergraduate Internship
item.description: Columbia Technology Ventures (CTV) and the Columbia Lab-to-Market Accelerator Network (L2M) are seeking undergraduate students from Columbia College, Columbia School of Engineering and Applied Science, Columbia General Studies, and Barnard for part-time (10 – 20 hours per week) temporary (6 – 8 weeks during June to August 2020) summer interns.
